alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 8:19PM CDT until March 31 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN VERMILION AND NORTHERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTIES... At 819 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gifford, or 9 miles southeast of Rantoul, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Potomac around 830 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Rossville and Hoopeston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 230 and 250. Interstate 72 near mile marker 182. Interstate 74 between mile markers 178 and 194. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for east central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
